name: Ghoulboy - Dark Sword of Goblin
description: Ghoulboy is a retro-inspired action platformer. Explore a magical realm of dungeons, towns, treasures and devious monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or newer Processor: 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb Storage: 460 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb Storage: 460 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
